document_data.name: Cameron Cymrych
document_data.mainbody: '''Cameron "the Wise" Cymrych''' was High King of the [[Moonshae Isles]] in the mid–4{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite dragon/362/Grand History of the Realms: The Moonshaes|32}}
document_data.Relationships: He was a member of the [[Cymrych Dynasty]]: he was the grandson of the dynasty's founder, High King [[Warren Cymrych I|Warren I]], and the great-grandson of the dynasty's legendary namesake, [[Cymrych Hugh]]. Cameron was the cousin of his predecessor, High King [[Markus Cymrych|Markus]], and his successor was his second son, [[Bran Cymrych]].
document_data.History:
Cameron assumed the throne of the High King in the {{YearlinkName|333}}, after the death of his predecessor.

He ruled for thirty-seven years before dying of natural causes in the {{YearlinkName|370}}.{{Cite dragon/362/Grand History of the Realms: The Moonshaes|26}}
